# Introduction
# Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
data <- read.csv("parent child data.csv")
ggplot(data, aes(x = ParentUncertainty, y = ChildExistenceScore)) +
  geom_point(aes(col = Domain)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(col = Domain)) + 
  ggtitle("") +
  labs(x = "Parent Uncertainty", y = "Child Existence Score", 
       subtitle = "Fig.1")
```

# Model
```{r}
library(ordinal)
summary(clmm(factor(ChildExistenceScore) ~ ParentUncertainty + ParentBeliefVariation + ParentRealityStatus
     + (1|Entity), data = data))
```
